name: Score Rush (itch)
description:
A game for a jam... (ScoreSpace Jam)

Controls:

Left mouse click and drag for jumping and sliding. (You have 3 jumps and slides before falling to a ground) Longer you drag upwards, stronger you jump. Draging downwards lets you slide.

Right mouse click and drag for moving objects. Longer you drag, stronger you push them.

Space for Start/Pause/Resume/Next Level

Collide objects with eachother for score! If you manage to collide them without letting them thouching to a ground for a several times, they give more points. But beware of the time. If you complete a level faster, your score gets multiplied, if you complete it slower, it gets divided.

Might include some bugs but it shouldn't be too bad. 

Sorry for the clumsy movements and wierd control descriptions.

Attributes:

The human model and sounds are CC0 assets I found on OpenGameArt. The links are below. 

Impact Sound: https://opengameart.org/content/impact

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/summer-park-8bit-tune-loop

Human: https://opengameart.org/content/mudeater-animated
